Articles.Content:
So I'm making planets and every single tutorial says you need a .dds file. First of all, how to make them without using SE? And if you use Space Engine, like me atm, then when I use a .dds file in my textures folder, the planet turns up completely black or completely white as a texture?

Anybody knows what's going wrong?

Sorry, just have a lot of questions! :3 I didn't know there was a kopernicus thread. I apologize!

Where can I find this kopernicus thread @Thomas P.?

Kopernicus Forum Thread

But in all seriousness, yes, the mod's threads are the best place to direct questions as the mod devs and users can help answer your queries.
Well is this it? ... -.- I can't find it on google. That's why I asked here
